questions.instructions: One pipe fills 2 pools in 4 hours. How many hours will it take for 3 pipes to fill 6 pools?
If the ratio between female to male users on an app is 9:2 and there are 1,026 female users, how many male users use the app?
60% of Jon’s salary equals 40% of Fred’s salary. If Jon’s salary is $120,000 a year, what is Fred’s yearly salary?
